name: (Just) Causin' Chaos
description: Get 1000 Chaos.
lockedDescription: Get 1000 Chaos.

name: Chaos is My Middle Name
description: Get 100000 Chaos.
lockedDescription: Get 100000 Chaos.

name: Chaos Millionaire
description: Get 1000000 Chaos.
lockedDescription: Get 1000000 Chaos.

name: ...Without Bullets!
description: Destroy every Chaos Object in a Military Base without weapons, grenades, or planted explosives.
lockedDescription: Destroy every Chaos Object in a Military Base without weapons, grenades, or planted explosives.

name: My Little Rocket Man
description: Tether an enemy to a launched gas cannister. Adeo, amico!
lockedDescription: Tether an enemy to a launched gas cannister. Adeo, amico!

name: This was Supposed to be a Western
description: Destroy all Chaos Objects in a Base without leaving your vehicle.
lockedDescription: Destroy all Chaos Objects in a Base without leaving your vehicle.

name: You're Outta Here!
description: Plant a Booster Explosive on an enemy soldier. Then send them flying.
lockedDescription: Plant a Booster Explosive on an enemy soldier. Then send them flying.

name: Bragging Rights
description: Beat another player's score in a Challenge.
lockedDescription: Beat another player's score in a Challenge.

name: Getting it in Gear

lockedDescription: Earn at least 3 Gears in a Challenge.

name: You've Got Gear

lockedDescription: Earn 5 Gears in a Challenge.

name: All the Gears

lockedDescription: Earn 5 Gears in every Challenge.

lockedDescription: Unlock Rebel Drops for at least one land vehicle, one air vehicle, and one sea vehicle.
